title: Lufthansa Says Co-Pilot Suffered From Depression During Training
teaser: Speculation about the mental state of the Germanwings co-pilot who crashed his plane in the French Alps a week ago has focused attention on airline industry practices.
contentencoded:
Speculation about the mental state of the Germanwings co-pilot who crashed his plane in the French Alps a week ago has focused attention on airline industry practices and questions of medical confidentiality.
